product_name: Sugoi Titan Ice Long-Sleeve Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stay cool as your body heats up in the men's Sugoi Titan Ice long-sleeve shirt. It uses advanced, moisture-wicking fabric to provide cooling airflow during long runs in warm weather. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying breathable fabric features a specialized technology that reduces the surface temperature of the fabric to create a cooling effect. Rear pocket stores essentials; specially placed seams reduce abrasion. The men's Sugoi Titan Ice long-sleeve shirt features reflective accents. Closeout.
short_description: Stay cool as your body heats up in the men's Sugoi Titan Ice long-sleeve shirt. It uses advanced, moisture-wicking fabric to provide cooling airflow during long runs in warm weather.
